condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section 1, A.3 | Description :Project StaffThe Fiduciary Team has been established within theProject Implementing Entity and the Project Implementing Entity has recruited the following consultants, each with terms ofreference, qualifications and experience satisfactory to the Association to be posted in the Fiduciary Team: (i) a procurementspecialist; and (ii) a financial management specialist. | Due Date :10-Mar-2014

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section 1, A.4 | Description :AuditorThe Project Implementing Entity shall recruit an internalauditor, no later than six (6) months after the Effective Date. | Due Date :14-Sep-2014

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section 1, B | Description :Subsidiary AgreementThe Subsidiary Agreement has been executed onbehalf of the Recipient and the Project Implementing Entity. | Due Date :23-Dec-2013

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section 1, G | Description :Project Implementation ManualThe Project Implementing Entity hasdeveloped for the Project and adopted the Project Implementation Manual, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association. |Due Date :23-Dec-2013

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section II, B.1 | Description :Installation of Accounting SoftwareThe Project ImplementingEntity shall purchase and install accounting software acceptable to the Association no later than four (4)months after theEffective Date. | Due Date :14-Jul-2014
